title: Button, 19th century
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description:
Circular button with shank, backed with tin.  a: Ornamented with wolf's head within a band; Tin is ornamented with leaf design and letters "IA" [?].

Component -a is on card 49

tombstone.epitaph:
Button, 19th century.
19th century. Brass and tin. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1925-2-354-a,i.
